articles.title: Maryland teen dies from coronavirus syndrome like Kawasaki - New York Daily News
articles.description: Maryland girl, 15, dies after contracting coronavirus, marking first official death in Baltimore County from a pediatric inflammatory syndrome linked to COVID-19 that's similar to Kawasaki disease.

articles.title: The biologist whose advice went viral tells us what to do next - CNN
articles.description: Stop worrying about those runners and cyclists without a mask, whom you scoff at as you walk outside. Biologist Erin Bromage, whose advice went viral, says to worry instead about the loud talkers in crowded indoor spaces.
